div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "px;" + "_height: " + data:height + "px;" + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "

div.span:
LET WORDS BRING LIFE TO YOUR SOUL
THERE IS LIFE IN THE PEN

“To gain your own voice,
you have to forget about having it heard

“If a nation loses its storytellers,
it loses its childhood.”

“We are all apprentices in a craft where ,
no one ever becomes a master.”

div.script: var numposts = 4;var showpostthumbnails = true;var showcommentnum = false;var showpostdate = true;var showpostsummary = false;var numchars = 100;

div.p: It's Looking like you may have been a wrong turn. Don't worry.....It happens to the best of us..
Has laoreet percipitur ad. Vide interesset in mei, no his legimus verterem. Et nostrum imperdiet appellantur usu, mnesarchum referrentur id vim.
